Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by SusanGene Sounds like a fibrocystic breast CONDITION. Twenty years ago I had "lumpy breasts" when under a LOT of stress. The doctor thought nothing of it but, then, he was a general practitioner, not an oncologist who must follow their "protocols" of investigation. Anyway, I took bee propolis and 800 IU of Vitamin E for 2 weeks and the lumps disappeared never to return. I don't think you have a thing to worry about except for overtreatment. I wouldn't let them use you as a human pincushion. GL, sweetie what is bees polops? im tg udos oil and evening primrose oil
